title: Current Matchmaking

replies.body:
also you said it yourself, boosting has always been a huge problem from plat to about diamond 4?

its only gotten worse, and nowadays you can just get boosted with references, its quite lame, it used to be people got boosted just to never play ranked again, and just spam aram or normals and when people saw they sucked it was lolwtf cant a guy just take a break in aram or normals and not try hard?

now these kids really believe they are good enough to hang in that boosted elo, and just ruin the games.

current match making reflects the current state of league, and its as bad as the servers.

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1577267047/200069224
Bad games like that happen here and there though, I'm talking about continuous bad matchmaking
like i said, elo boosting has gotten worse.
